description: G¨¦rald Darmanin - appointed interior minister on Monday - is under investigation for alleged rape.
title: G¨¦rald Darmanin: Macron backs new interior minister accused of rape
title_page: G¨¦rald Darmanin: Macron backs new interior minister accused of rape - BBC News
maintext: Mr Darmanin has also in the past been accused of sexual harassment during his time as mayor of Tourcoing. An unnamed woman said he asked her for sexual favours between 2014 and 2017 in exchange for social housing - allegations he also strenuously denies.
